network_overview: The capture shows a 4G LTE/EPC control-plane trace with 100 % Diameter authentication/authorization failures (Result-Code 2001) for every UE attach attempt, while S1-AP keeps the eNB-MME SCTP association alive. No user-plane GTP tunnels are established and no voice/IMS traffic is present, indicating subscribers cannot get data or VoLTE service.

observations.finding: All 6 Diameter Cmd-318/316/324 transactions return Result-Code 2001 (DIAMETER_ERROR_USER_UNKNOWN), so no EPS sessions are created.
S1-AP Proc-11/13/23 exchange continues for 11 min with 0 % errors, proving the radio & transport path is healthy.
Zero SIP, RTP or IMS signaling packets; VoLTE is completely absent.

root_causes.description: The MME (10.47.18.6/10) sends Update-Location-Request (Cmd-318), Create-Session-Request (Cmd-316) and Policy-Control-Request (Cmd-324) for three different IMSIs, but the HSS/SPR (10.47.9.68) answers with DIAMETER_ERROR_USER_UNKNOWN (2001) each time. Consequently no UE context is created and no GTP-C bearer request is ever sent.
root_causes.impact: Subscribers remain detached; zero data or voice service.

recommendations.action: Check HSS subscriber data for IMSIs ending ...b47e19fc, ...b842bb4d, ...b0928458 and ensure they are provisioned and not barred.
recommendations.rationale: Eliminates the 100 % Diameter 2001 rejections and allows normal attach.

recommendations.action: Verify MME’s Diameter Origin-Host/Realm configuration matches HSS peer table to avoid silent user-unknown mapping errors.
recommendations.rationale: Prevents mis-routing of requests to wrong HSS or peer.

recommendations.action: Enable VoLTE by confirming IMS APN, PGW selection and DNS records for P-CSCF are present once attach succeeds.
recommendations.rationale: Restores voice service after data attach is fixed.

session_analysis.signaling_health: S1-AP SCTP association stable; Diameter fails every UE authentication → no NAS security context created.
session_analysis.user_plane_health: No GTP-C Create-Bearer requests seen, therefore zero GTP-U tunnels and zero user data.
session_analysis.voice_quality: No SIP registration or RTP flows; VoLTE unavailable.
session_analysis.cross_plane_correlation: Diameter failure blocks GTP-C setup, which in turn prevents user-plane and IMS signaling.

sequence_diagram:
sequenceDiagram
    participant UE
    participant eNB
    participant MME
    participant HSS
    UE->>eNB: RRC Connection Request
    eNB->>MME: S1-AP Initial UE Message (Attach)
    MME->>HSS: Diameter Update-Location-Request (Cmd-318)
    HSS->>MME: Diameter 2001 User Unknown
    MME-->>UE: Attach Reject
    Note over UE,HSS: No bearer, no data, no VoLTE
